name: All Night Long Remix - Losi x Dre

metadata.description:
Back in December 2021, just about 10 days after I had gotten into NFTs, Dre messaged me:

"I see that youâ€™re into music, love it. Iâ€™m sure we will interact more ğŸ™ğŸ’¿ğŸ˜Š" 

The reason I mention this is because that messaged sparked a friendship, and several music collaborations, that showed me the power of web3. 

"All Night Long" is our second music collaboration, and we are very excited to bring it to the blockchain with R3vl! To celebrate the mint, we will be giving away a Loser Club NFT, a 1/1 art piece by Dre himself, and other surprises along the way ;)! 

And, recent light of what has happened in Turkey and Syria, 20% of the proceeds raised from the mint will be donated towards the cause of your choosingğŸ¤

This is a celebration of music, art, and community!
